mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise (category_id, diary_id, weight, count, `set`, posture_img, done) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{diaryId}, #{weight}, #{count}, #{set}, #{postureImg}, #{done});
mapper.update: UPDATE exercise SET weight = #{weight}, count = #{count}, `set` = #{set}, posture_img = CASE WHEN #{postureImg} IS NOT NULL THEN #{postureImg} ELSE posture_img END, done = CASE WHEN #{done} IS NOT NULL THEN #{done} ELSE done END WHERE id = #{id};
